languages.text: Под пропитанной кровью и гноем робой дрожит в цепях изувеченный человек: его волосы, зубы и ногти выпали, а кожа скукожилась и покрылась нарывами.
A maimed, enchained person is shivering under a robe soaked with blood and pus. Their teeth and nails have fallen out, and their shrunken skin is covered in abscesses.
languages.original_text: Под пропитанной кровью и гноем робой дрожит в цепях изувеченный человек: его волосы, зубы и ногти выпали, а кожа скукожилась и покрылась нарывами.

traits.locale_text: A maimed and enchained being is shivering under a robe soaked with blood and pus. Their teeth and nails have fallen out, and their shrunken skin is covered in abscesses.

A maimed, enchained being is shivering under a robe soaked with blood and pus. Their teeth and nails have fallen out, and their shrunken skin is covered in abscesses.

languages.text: Una persona mutilada y encadenada tiembla bajo una túnica empapada de sangre y pus. Ha perdido los dientes y las uñas y su piel marchitada está cubierta de forúnculos.
languages.original_text: A maimed, enchained person is shivering under a robe soaked with blood and pus. Their teeth and nails have fallen out, and their shrunken skin is covered in abscesses.

traits.locale_text: Una persona mutilada y encadenada tiembla bajo una túnica empapada de sangre y pus. Ha perdido los dientes y las uñas y su piel marchitada está cubierta de forúnculos.

languages.text: 手足を切断され、鎖につながれた者が、血と膿で濡れそぼった衣の下で震えている。歯と詰めは抜け落ち、萎びきった皮膚は主要に覆われている。
languages.original_text: A maimed, enchained person is shivering under a robe soaked with blood and pus. Their teeth and nails have fallen out, and their shrunken skin is covered in abscesses.

traits.locale_text: 手足を切断され、鎖につながれた者が、血と膿で濡れそぼった衣の下で震えている。歯と詰めは抜け落ち、萎びきった皮膚は主要に覆われている。

languages.text: 这个残废的人身上挂着铁链，颤抖着，身上的长袍浸透了鲜血和脓液。他的牙齿和指甲已经脱落，萎缩的皮肤上到处都是脓疮。
languages.original_text: A maimed, enchained person is shivering under a robe soaked with blood and pus. Their teeth and nails have fallen out, and their shrunken skin is covered in abscesses.

traits.locale_text: 这个残废的人身上挂着铁链，颤抖着，身上的长袍浸透了鲜血和脓液。他的牙齿和指甲已经脱落，萎缩的皮肤上到处都是脓疮。

languages.text: Unter einer mit Blut und Eiter getränkten Robe zittert eine verstümmelte, gefesselte Gestalt. Ihre Nägel und Zähne fehlen und ihre eingefallene Haut ist mit Abszessen bedeckt.
languages.original_text: A maimed, enchained person is shivering under a robe soaked with blood and pus. Their teeth and nails have fallen out, and their shrunken skin is covered in abscesses.

traits.locale_text: Unter einer mit Blut und Eiter getränkten Robe zittert eine verstümmelte, gefesselte Gestalt. Ihre Nägel und Zähne fehlen und ihre eingefallene Haut ist mit Abszessen bedeckt.

languages.text: Enveloppé dans une robe imprégnée de sang et de pus, un être mutilé et enchaîné grelotte de tous ses membres. En plus d'avoir perdu ses dents et ses ongles, sa peau émaciée est recouverte d'abcès.
languages.original_text: A maimed, enchained person is shivering under a robe soaked with blood and pus. Their teeth and nails have fallen out, and their shrunken skin is covered in abscesses.

traits.locale_text: Enveloppé dans une robe imprégnée de sang et de pus, un être mutilé et enchaîné grelotte de tous ses membres. En plus d'avoir perdu ses dents et ses ongles, sa peau émaciée est recouverte d'abcès.

languages.text: Zincire vurulmuş sakat bir insan, kan ve irine bulanmış bir cübbenin altında tir tir titriyor. Dişleri ve tırnakları dökülmüş. Ufacık kalmış derisi ise çıbanlarla kaplı.
languages.original_text: A maimed, enchained person is shivering under a robe soaked with blood and pus. Their teeth and nails have fallen out, and their shrunken skin is covered in abscesses.
